mapper.select: select paperid,questype,quesname,typescore from (select ques_paper.paperId as paperid,ques_paper.quesType as questype,questype.quesName as quesname ,sum(sing_ques.score) as typescore from sing_ques,ques_paper,questype where ques_paper.quesId=sing_ques.quesId and ques_paper.quesType=sing_ques.quesType and questype.quesType=ques_paper.quesType GROUP BY paperid ,questype,quesname UNION select ques_paper.paperId as paperid,ques_paper.quesType as questype,questype.quesName as quesname ,sum(mult_ques.score) as typescore from mult_ques,ques_paper,questype where ques_paper.quesId=mult_ques.quesId and ques_paper.quesType=mult_ques.quesType and questype.quesType=ques_paper.quesType GROUP BY paperid ,questype,quesname UNION select ques_paper.paperId as paperid,ques_paper.quesType as questype,questype.quesName as quesname ,sum(fill_ques.score) as typescore from fill_ques,ques_paper,questype where ques_paper.quesId=fill_ques.quesId and ques_paper.quesType=fill_ques.quesType and questype.quesType=ques_paper.quesType GROUP BY paperid ,questype,quesname UNION select ques_paper.paperId as paperid,ques_paper.quesType as questype,questype.quesName as quesname ,sum(judge_ques.score) as typescore from judge_ques,ques_paper,questype where ques_paper.quesId=judge_ques.quesId and ques_paper.quesType=judge_ques.quesType and questype.quesType=ques_paper.quesType GROUP BY paperid ,questype,quesname UNION select ques_paper.paperId as paperid,ques_paper.quesType as questype,questype.quesName as quesname ,sum(short_ques.score) as typescore from short_ques,ques_paper,questype where ques_paper.quesId=short_ques.quesId and ques_paper.quesType=short_ques.quesType and questype.quesType=ques_paper.quesType GROUP BY paperid ,questype,quesname ) as b where paperid=#{paperid} ORDER BY paperid ,questype,quesname,typescore
